name: looker-studio-custom-date-selector
description: community visualization for date selection in looker studio

scripts.build:dev: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && export npm_package_dsccViz_jsonFile=index.json && export npm_package_dsccViz_jsFile=index.js && export npm_package_dsccViz_cssFile=index.css && export npm_package_dsccViz_gcsDevBucket=gs://qrew-looker-studio-visualizations/qrew-custom-date-selector/dev/ && export npm_package_dsccViz_gcsProdBucket=gs://qrew-looker-studio-visualizations/qrew-custom-date-selector/prod/ && dscc-scripts viz build -d dev
scripts.build:prod: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && dscc-scripts viz build -d prod
scripts.push:dev: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && export npm_package_dsccViz_jsonFile=index.json && export npm_package_dsccViz_jsFile=index.js && export npm_package_dsccViz_cssFile=index.css && export npm_package_dsccViz_gcsDevBucket=gs://qrew-looker-studio-visualizations/qrew-custom-date-selector/dev/ && export npm_package_dsccViz_gcsProdBucket=gs://qrew-looker-studio-visualizations/qrew-custom-date-selector/prod/ && dscc-scripts viz push -d dev
scripts.push:prod: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && dscc-scripts viz push -d prod
scripts.start: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && export npm_package_dsccViz_jsonFile=index.json && export npm_package_dsccViz_jsFile=index.js && export npm_package_dsccViz_cssFile=index.css && export npm_package_dsccViz_gcsDevBucket=gs://qrew-looker-studio-visualizations/qrew-custom-date-selector/dev/ && export npm_package_dsccViz_gcsProdBucket=gs://qrew-looker-studio-visualizations/qrew-custom-date-selector/prod/ && dscc-scripts viz start

author: landanqrew
